name: Journey to the Center of the Corn
name_original: Journey to the Center of the Corn
description:
Play as Theo, who gets lost in a corn maze on a school trip. Theo is a bully, but you have the power to change that with your choices, for the better or worse.

Features:

  • Talking cat (with yarn!)
  • Punk Icarus
  • The Minotaur's cow-centaur brother
  • Frog in a suit
  • Tired snail
  • Customizable pronouns for Theo
  • Content warning: bad puns

Currently, the game is complete. The assets and writing might be polished more later. Created in <48 hours for Slice of Jam.

Art by imjumokay, coding by sacredbagel, and writing by rustle-rabbit.

Music: Cattails and Nu Flute by Kevin MacLeod.
